H0.text: What painter is sometimes confused with Claude Monet because their last names differ by just a single letter. Moret

H1.text: What painter is sometimes confused with Claude Monet because their last names differ by just a single letter. Bonet

H2.text: What painter is sometimes confused with Claude Monet because their last names differ by just a single letter. Monnet

H3.text: What painter is sometimes confused with Claude Monet because their last names differ by just a single letter. Manet

A4.text: Manet was a French modernist painter.
